DC CODE ยง 50-2513

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Bonds issued by the Authority and the interest thereon are exempt from District taxation except estate, inheritance, and gift taxes.
Real and personal property owned and used for exempt purposes by the Authority shall be exempt from District taxation.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

subtitle.text: Vehicles on Public and Private Space.
